import httpx
import json

filters = {
    ''dateRange'': {''start'': ''2024-01-01'', ''end'': ''2025-12-31''},
    ''organization'': None,
    ''location'': None,
    ''verificationType'': None
}

print\(''='' * 60\)
print\(''TEST 1: Action Priorities''\)
print\(''='' * 60\)
r = httpx.post\(''http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/action-priorities'', json=filters, timeout=30\)
print\(f''Status: {r.status_code}''\)
if r.status_code == 200:
    data = r.json\(\)
    print\(f''Total categories: {len\(data\)}''\)
    for item in data:
        print\(f''  - {item[""category""]}: {item[""count""]} acoes \(color: {item[""color""]}\)''\)
else:
    print\(f''Error: {r.text}''\)

print\(\)
print\(''='' * 60\)
print\(''TEST 2: Actions \(page 1, 5 items\)''\)
print\(''='' * 60\)
r = httpx.post\(''http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/actions?page=1&page_size=5'', json=filters, timeout=30\)
print\(f''Status: {r.status_code}''\)
if r.status_code == 200:
    data = r.json\(\)
    print\(f''Response structure: {list\(data.keys\(\)\)}''\)
    print\(json.dumps\(data, indent=2\)\)
else:
    print\(f''Error: {r.text}''\)
")
